description:
Equally suited to layering and lounging, the Dalston Long Sleeve Sweatshirt is an everyday pullover that’s big on both style and comfort. Designed with warm and breathable RealFleece™ fabric with a brushed lining for a super-cozy feel, the Dalston also features a classic crew-neck design with ribbed neck, cuffs and hem, as well as side-seam hand pockets to stash small essentials. 

Superfine merino fibers are brushed to create icebreaker RealFleece™, a natural fleece that warms and breathes next to your skin. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Dalston LS Sweatshirt - Mens
